title: Robinson Crusoe
creator_credit: Avant Films, Mario Marzac and Rene Cardona Jnr
brief_description: This is the classic tale of the castaway Crusoe, as told by a narrating tiger that witnesses his struggles to survive the man-eating cannibals that have landed on the tropical island where he washed up. Hugo Stiglitz plays Daniel Defoe’s famous hero.
creator_credit_for_label: Avant Films, Mario Marzac and Rene Cardona Jnr
